rdf:Description.request-schema:postBootScript:
cat >> /etc/hosts <<EOF 172.16.1.1 nimbus.storm nimbus 172.16.1.2 zookeeper.storm zookeeper 172.16.1.100 slave-0.storm slave-0 172.16.1.101 slave-1.storm slave-1 172.16.1.102 slave-2.storm slave-2 EOF
yum -y update yum -y install java-1.7.0 java-1.7.0-openjdk-devel libtool libuuid-devel gcc gcc-c++ make supervisor
cd /root wget http://download.zeromq.org/zeromq-2.2.0.tar.gz tar zxvf zeromq-2.2.0.tar.gz cd zeromq-2.2.0 ./configure make install ldconfig
cd /root export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.7.0-openjdk-1.7.0.75.x86_64 wget https://github.com/nathanmarz/jzmq/archive/master.zip -O jzmq-master.zip unzip jzmq-master cd jzmq-master ./autoconf ./configure make install
cd /root wget http://mirrors.koehn.com/apache/storm/apache-storm-0.9.4/apache-storm-0.9.4.tar.gz tar zxvf apache-storm-0.9.4.tar.gz cat >> apache-storm-0.9.4/conf/storm.yaml << EOF storm.zookeeper.servers: - "zookeeper" nimbus.host: "nimbus" storm.local.dir: "/var/storm" EOF
cat >> /etc/supervisord.conf << EOF [program:storm_supervisor] command=/root/apache-storm-0.9.4/bin/storm supervisor autostart=true autorestart=true startsecs=1 startretries=999 redirect_stderr=false stdout_logfile=/var/log/storm-nimbus-out stdout_logfile_maxbytes=10MB stdout_logfile_backups=10 stdout_events_enabled=true stderr_logfile=/var/log/storm-nimbus-err stderr_logfile_maxbytes=100MB stderr_logfile_backups=10 stderr_events_enabled=true EOF
service supervisord start

cat >> /etc/hosts <<EOF 172.16.1.1 nimbus.storm nimbus 172.16.1.2 zookeeper.storm zookeeper 172.16.1.100 slave-0.storm slave-0 172.16.1.101 slave-1.storm slave-1 172.16.1.102 slave-2.storm slave-2 EOF yum -y update yum -y install java-1.7.0 java-1.7.0-openjdk-devel libtool libuuid-devel gcc gcc-c++ make supervisor
wget http://mirror.cc.columbia.edu/pub/software/apache/zookeeper/current/zookeeper-3.4.6.tar.gz -P /root
cd /root tar zxvf zookeeper-3.4.6.tar.gz
mkdir /var/zookeeper cp zookeeper-3.4.6/conf/zoo_sample.cfg zookeeper-3.4.6/conf/zoo.cfg echo "dataDir=/var/zookeeper" >> zookeeper-3.4.6/conf/zoo.cfg
cat >> /etc/supervisord.conf << EOF [program:zookeeper] command=/root/zookeeper-3.4.6/bin/zkServer.sh start-foreground autostart=true autorestart=true startsecs=1 startretries=999 redirect_stderr=false stdout_logfile=/var/log/zookeeper-out stdout_logfile_maxbytes=10MB stdout_logfile_backups=10 stdout_events_enabled=true stderr_logfile=/var/log/zookeeper-err stderr_logfile_maxbytes=100MB stderr_logfile_backups=10 stderr_events_enabled=true EOF
service supervisord start

cd /root export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.7.0-openjdk-1.7.0.75.x86_64 wget https://github.com/nathanmarz/jzmq/archive/master.zip -O jzmq-master.zip unzip jzmq-master cd jzmq-master ./autoconf ./configure make install
